title: Apple Becomes First U.S. Company to Reach $3 Trillion Market Value; The iPhone maker's shares pass the milestone after a 38% jump since beginning of 2021
text:
Apple is a staple in retail and institutional investors' portfolios. The milestone marked a 38% rise for Apple's shares since the beginning of 2021, among the biggest gains in the Dow Jones Industrial Average.

Apple Becomes First U.S. Company to Reach $3 Trillion Market Value
